column4: Can someone please help me? Are the errors on the liveCD normal?

{ep2011> okay, when I load the livecd of ubuntu 6.10 for PC, it almost finishes loading the progress bar, and then a bunch of errors pop up about missing some kind of thing - about 8 lines of the same thing, and then about 8 more lines pop up saying Permission denied, and then about 5 minutes later it goes back to loading. - should I be worried about installing it? I've redownloaded it once and burned it on 2 diffent kinds of m
i downloaded from the official torrent tracker
I didnt use a mirror - I used a torrent, but okay ill try a mirror and ill reburn it
if you used a torrent, the file should be fine
a torrent hash checks every piece, so that file you have should be flawless
- but it isn't, ive downloaded it twice, and burned it on 2 different kinds of media

in fact one of the suggested ways to fix bad downloads, is to simply download the torrent and save it to the same directory so that it will hash check all the pieces and redownload whatever is messed up
Either, really, I don't really care
well I backed up my files and just burned them onto dvds
which codecs would I install for mplayer, it uses xine if im not mistaken, so not the gstreamer codecs?
